abilities.name: Bero Cannon
abilities.description: The user transforms their tongue into a cannon capable of shooting projectiles at opponents.

abilities.name: Body Consumption and Transformation
abilities.description: The user can eat anything and transform parts of their body to replicate the characteristics and function of whatever they've eaten in the most recent 24 hours. For example, eating a cannon allows the user to transform a body part into a cannon.

abilities.name: Enhanced Mouth Expansion
abilities.description: The user can stretch open their mouth to large sizes and eat things in massive proportions, including attempting to consume people whole.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (seawater, Sea-Prism Stone)

keyMoments.description: Wapol uses Bero Cannon against Luffy during their final battle
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates the versatility of the Baku Baku no Mi's transformation abilities

abilities.name: Gomu Gomu no Bow Gun
abilities.description: Luffy uses his rubber body like a bow to fire opponents upward with great force, capable of lodging them into structures.

abilities.name: Gomu Gomu no Bazooka (Enhanced Version)
abilities.description: A stronger version of the standard Gomu Gomu no Bazooka specifically used to send heavy opponents flying great distances. Used to defeat Wapol and send him flying from Drum Island.

keyMoments.description: Luffy debuts Gomu Gomu no Bow Gun, shooting Wapol into the castle dome
keyMoments.significance: Introduces a new creative application of Luffy's rubber powers

keyMoments.description: Luffy uses an enhanced Gomu Gomu no Bazooka to defeat Wapol and send him flying from the island
keyMoments.significance: Concludes the main battle of the Drum Island Arc and liberates the kingdom
